title: People applying for probate
question: Do you want to apply with anyone else?
paragraph1: If there are other people entitled to inherit, you can make a joint application with up to 3 of them. They will also be named on the grant of probate.
paragraph2: All applicants will be given the legal right to deal with {deceasedName}’s estate. This includes:
bullet1: collecting the estate’s assets (property, money and possessions)
bullet3: distributing what is left to the people entitled to it
paragraph3: Not applying does not affect a person’s entitlement to inherit.

hasCoApplicant.required: Select ‘Yes’ if you want to apply with another person
hasCoApplicant.invalid: You can only apply with up to 3 other people
